mapper.update: update mg_suit set suit_name = #{suitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suit_type = #{suitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_type = #{saleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where suit_id = #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select suit_id, suit_name, suit_type, sale_type, price, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by, status from mg_suit where suit_id = #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select suit_id, suit_name, suit_type, sale_type, price, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by, status from mg_suit
